CALLING ALL SEASONAL STAFF NCS: IGNITE - 29th NOVEMBER 2014
Ignite is taking place on Saturday 29th November 2014 across the UK for young people who have completed the NCS The Challenge
This is a one-day event for our graduates to celebrate what they have achieved this summer, and help them discover the next step for employment and community service.
This is a chance for our seasonal staff to join the young people they worked with over the summer once again, and resume their leader and mentor roles.
LEAD AND MENTOR
What does this entail?
Each NCS: Ignite event has been organised by the local programmes team. Hours of work will vary for each location, on average lasting for 6 hours.
Seasonal staff will be paid for each hour they work: Leader roles will be paid £12 per hour, and Mentor roles will receive £10 per hour.
Please enter your availability HERE if you would like to be considered for a role in your area. https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/XWSRM8F
Please register your availability by Monday 17 Nov. HURRY PLACES ARE LIMITED!
For more information on NCS: Ignite, please contact your local staffing team.
VISIT NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG NOW
